projects.title: Product Listing Website
projects.description: This web application allows users to browse and explore a list of products with advanced filtering, searching, and pagination features. The application is built using HTML, JavaScript, and CSS.

projects.title: Personal Web Page
projects.description: This is a personal website application that I developed for assignment of 'Web & Mobile I' course.

projects.title: Online Banking System
projects.description: This is an Online Banking System which was developed by me as an assignment from Programming Principles II course in ADA University.

cards.back: The virtual DOM is a lightweight copy of the real DOM, used for efficient updating of the UI.

cards.front: Explain the concept of state in React.
cards.back: State is a mechanism in React components that allows them to have mutable data.
Props are short for properties and are used to pass data from one component to another.
A React component is a reusable piece of UI that can be composed with other components to build a complex UI.

cards.front: What is the purpose of the useEffect hook?
cards.back: The useEffect hook is used for performing side effects in functional components, such as data fetching or subscriptions.
The useContext hook is used for accessing the values of React context outside of the render function.

cards.front: Explain the concept of a higher-order component (HOC) in React.
cards.back: A higher-order component is a function that takes a component and returns a new component with enhanced features or props.
Redux is a state management library for JavaScript applications, commonly used with React.

cards.front: Explain the concept of controlled components in React forms.
cards.back: Controlled components are form elements whose values are controlled by React, allowing dynamic manipulation of form data.

cards.front: What is the purpose of the useCallback hook?
cards.back: The useCallback hook is used to memoize functions in React, preventing unnecessary renders in child components.
React Router is a library for handling navigation and routing in React applications.

cards.front: Explain the concept of code splitting in React.
cards.back: Code splitting is a technique in React to split the bundle into smaller chunks, allowing for more efficient loading of the application.

cards.front: What is the purpose of the useMemo hook?
cards.back: The useMemo hook is used to memoize values in React, preventing unnecessary calculations during renders.
